text: {{Infobox officeholder | name = Konstantinos Tsatsos | image = Konstantinos Tsatsos.JPG | office = President of Greece | primeminister = Konstantinos Karamanlis | term_start = 19 July 1975 | term_end = 10 May 1980 | predecessor = Michail Stasinopoulos | successor = Konstantinos Karamanlis | birth_date = | birth_place = Athens, Greece | death_date = | death_place = Athens, Greece | death_cause = Thyroid cancer | party = Liberal Party National Radical Union Independent New Democracy | spouse = Ioanna Seferiadou (1909-2000) | alma_mater = University of Athens Heidelberg University | native_name = }} Konstantinos D. Tsatsos (; July 1, 1899 - October 8, 1987) was a Greek, professor of law, scholar and politician. He was the second President of the Third Hellenic Republic from 1975 to 1980. ==Other websites== * Official Biography Category:1899 births Category:1987 deaths Category:Deaths from thyroid cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Greece Category:Presidents of Greece Category:Politicians from Athens
title: Konstantinos Tsatsos
